Famed actor and Oscar-nominated director '''Otto Preminger''' (1906 â€“ 1986) was the voice for the "Elvenking" ([[Thranduil]]) in the [[Rankin/Bass]] animated version of ''[[The Hobbit (1977 film)|The Hobbit]]''. He was born and raised in Austria, and his thick accent is very apparent in the film.
